attributes.action: Rotate the New Year fireworks display between the 3 capital cities
attributes.additional_details: This should be done as the UK has 3 capital cities and should be fair for the other two nations to showcase their city on new year instead of it always being London.
attributes.background: I think that the New Year fireworks display display should rotate between London, Cardiff and Edinburgh.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about organising fireworks displays in individual cities are the responsibility of the local authorities in those areas. Decisions about which, if any, display to broadcast on national television are the responsibility of the individual broadcasters.
